name: Hypr Rocket Launcher for Kids - Patented Designed Launcher Reach up to 500 Feet with Turbo Mode, 3 Rockets Included, Connectable Launcher for Multi Player Fun, Easy Set Up, Durable, Kids Outdoor Toys
short_description: Patented Designed Launcher for High-Flying Action: Our Hypr Rocket features a unique and patented launcher design that sends rockets soaring up to an incredible 500 feet with Turbo Mode, providing endless excitement and outdoor fun for boys and girls alike.

Multi-Player Fun with Connectable Launcher: Get the party started with our Connectable Launcher, allowing multiple players to join in the fun. Watch as kids challenge each other to see whose rocket can reach the farthest distance, fostering friendly competition and teamwork.
Non-Stop Play: With three rockets included, the fun never has to end! Kids can enjoy launching their rockets over and over again, engaging in active play while developing their physical skills.

Easy Set-Up for Instant Adventure: Say goodbye to complicated assembly. Our Hypr Rocket is designed for easy set-up, enabling kids to jump into the action right away. No more waiting around – just stomp, launch, and let the fun begin!

Outdoor Play: Promote active play and outdoor exploration with our Hypr Rocket. As children stomp and launch their rockets, they develop hand-eye coordination, balance, and physical fitness, making it a perfect gift that combines fun with learning.
product_description: Our Patented Designed Launcher is the perfect choice for boys and girls who love adventure and high-flying action. Let their imagination soar as they experience the thrill of reaching up to 500 feet with our Turbo Mode! With three rockets included, the fun never stops! Watch as they stomp on the launcher and witness their rockets soar through the sky, providing endless entertainment and healthy outdoor play. The Hypr Rocket is a great way to encourage kids to stay active while having a blast. But the excitement doesn't end there! Our Connectable Launcher allows for multi-player fun, making it an excellent addition to playdates, parties, and family gatherings. Kids can challenge their friends and siblings to see whose rocket can go the farthest, creating friendly competition and unforgettable memories. Setting up the Hypr Rocket is a breeze, ensuring that kids can get right to the action without any hassle. It's easy to assemble and launch, making it a fantastic choice for parents and caregivers who want to keep the young adventurers engaged and entertained. Not only does the Hypr Rocket provide endless fun and excitement, but it also promotes active play, hand-eye coordination, and outdoor exploration. So let your kids embark on a thrilling adventure with our high-flying Hypr Rocket and experience the joy of outdoor play like never before. Let their imaginations soar and watch them create unforgettable moments with this one-of-a-kind toy!

name: Geospace Pump Rocket Bungee Blast JR. Battle Pack (2 Launchers + 5 Foam Rockets Total)
short_description: Patented EZ Bungee-Pull System is the latest air power blast-off method for launching foam rockets! Comes with 2 Launchers and 5 Foam Rockets
Launcher remains intact making re-loading rockets quick and easy, even for a Kindergartener!
Rockets are made of foam with a special, super-soft foam tip for safety, even indoors.
Fun to play alone, with a friend, or in groups. Kids can invent their own games or targets.
Battle Pack includes 2 Bungee Blast JR Launchers with Rockets, plus 1 Pack of Replacement Rockets. Assembly required.
product_description: Original Geospace Pump Rockets are already a rollicking blast to fire. But BUNGEE BLAST JR ramps up the fun and excitement by an order of magnitude. Engineered with a patented elastic bungee cord inside the pump cylinder to turbo boost the launching power. Load a foam rocket into one end and pull back the cylinder, feeling the increasing tension of the cord inside. Then let go. Kids will be amazed as the stored energy of the cord pushes the piston of air very forcefully, blasting the rocket out at hyper-speed. It’s like putting a turbo-charger inside! For Ages 3 to adult (youngest kids from 3-5 years old may have an easier time with the Bungee Blast Mini). Length of Rocket Launcher is 27.5 inches. This Battle Pack comes with 2 Launchers and a total of 7 Foam Rockets. Bungee Blast is also available in a Mini Size. If you need more rockets, look for Bungee Blast Replacement Rockets 5-Pack (sold separately).

name: Rocket Launcher for Kids, 200 ft Self Launching Motorized Rocket Toy with LED and Safety Parachute Land, Outdoor Toys Cool Birthday for Boys Ages 8-12 (Orange)
short_description: 2025 Upgrade Design: We’ve enhanced our rocket launcher with a powerful booster model. Our rocket launcher encourages hands-on STEM discovery, sparks social play, and gets kids off screens and into the great outdoors with friends

2 Launch Heights: Two flight modes let young explorers customize their launch: Press the launch button once for a 100 ft ascent (4s flight time), or press twice quickly to soar up to 200 ft (8s flight time). Ideal for open fields and soccer pitches

Kid-Safe Design: Crafted from lightweight, resilient EPP foam with a built-in parachute, our rocket weighs just 59 g and features a soft exterior for worry-free play. At peak altitude, the parachute deploys automatically, gently guiding the rocket back to earth for safe retrieval

Eco-Friendly & Rechargeable: Powered by a premium rechargeable battery, our rocket fully charges via the included USB cable in just 40 minutes, delivering 25–40 launches per charge (depending on flight mode). This sustainable design slashes replacement costs and reduces waste, so kids can keep the fun going without the hassle of disposable batteries

All Day Play: Equipped with a vibrant blue LED light that stays steady during launch and flashes during descent, making it easy to track and recover in any light. Enjoy reliable, screen‑free fun From morning till night

product_description: Stomp Rocket Dueling Stomp Racers, Race Your Friends to the Finish- 2 Toy Car Launchers and 2 Air Powered Cars with Ramp and Finish Line. Great for Outdoor and Indoor Play, STEM Gifts for Boys and Girls -Ages 5, 6,7, 8. Run, Jump, and Stomp your way to active play! Stomp Rocket has stood the test of time with 30 years of quality and expertise. Our rockets are designed for the most active stompers. Rocket launcher base is sturdy and durable allowing for hours of endless outdoor play! Kids are independently entertained for hours with Stomp Rockets. These toy rocket, car, and plane launchers have been designed to easily fold for storage and travel. 100% Kid-Powered, no batteries required. Perfect for birthday and holiday gifts. Our adjustable launcher allows kids to experiment with angles and force. Get kids interested in STEM subjects (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math). Pair this set with a Stomp Rocket Stompin' Science Book. If you’re loving Stomp Rockets, take a look at our Brand Store to see what other rocket sets your Stomp Rocket might be compatible with! Many of our stands and rockets can be used with one another. Better yet, browse the catalog to see which Stomp Rocket products can be used for the whole family! Jr. Glow, Ultra, Ultra LED and Stunt Planes can be commingled and used interchangeably with the same Rocket Launcher Stand! Also, our full product selection offers toys that are safe for children ages 3 - 9 years + and range from Stomp Rockets, to Race Cars, Planes, and Magnetic Darts, Blow Darts, and more! The Stomp Rocket is a family owned brand founded in 1993 in Minden, Nevada. What started as a small business with the Original Stomp Rocket toys, has grown into a thriving company that sold over 7 million toys in the United States and internationally. Several generations of children have grown with the Stomp Rocket 100% kid-powered toys, earning parents’ trust and brand loyalty.
